name: Fred the Frog
description:
Fred the Frog is a submission to Weekly Game Jam #31

This is my first game so JUDGE IT HARSHLY!

In this game you eat flys and dragonflys, you have to eat as much as you can before the fish catches you, if the fish gets you... you die and have to start over!

Controls:

Hover over a lily pad and press SPACEBAR to jump to it

Click to shoot out tongue
